post.description: Adds a not existing user to an account. the provider field is optional and if not provided it will be taken from the account model
Not implemented yet: update the user defined account fields. Receives a settings object (will be defined later)
Add new account. Receives an account object

get.description: get all the accounts in the system

post.description: Not implemented yet: Update the account info that only codefresh admins (codefresh employees, not account admin) can access

sdk.helm.sections.create({
    boardId: `${BOARD_ID_STR}`,
    color: `${COLOR_STR}`,
    index: INDEX_NUM,
    name: `${NAME_STR}`,
    section: `${SECTION_STR}`
})

sdk.helm.sections.update({ id }, {
    boardId: `${BOARD_ID_STR}`,
    color: `${COLOR_STR}`,
    index: INDEX_NUM,
    name: `${NAME_STR}`,
    section: `${SECTION_STR}`
})

sdk.helm.sections.patch({ id }, {
    boardId: `${BOARD_ID_STR}`,
    color: `${COLOR_STR}`,
    index: INDEX_NUM,
    name: `${NAME_STR}`,
    section: `${SECTION_STR}`
})
